subtitle: A moist, fruity cake that can be made at the last minute. Not only for Christmas but Easter, weddings, birthdays.

method.text: Put all the fruit into a pan with orange juice, golden syrup, butter and rum. Heat slowly until butter melts then simmer gently for 5 min, stirring to mix. Allow to cool slightly.
Grease a deep 20 cm round tin and line base and sides with a double layer of greaseproof paper.
Sift flours with baking powder and spices into a large bowl. Mix in fruit mixture and eggs. Beat together. Stir in diced marzipan,
Turn into prepared tin. Cover with foil. Bake in oven for 1 days. Cool in the tin.
To decorate: Heat jam and brandy together. Brush over the top of the cake. Arrange nuts on top. Brush with remaining glaze. Allow to set.

title: Last minute Christmas cake
